title: SDE-1
description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on Klaviss, a US-based real estate platform, where I directly interacted with the client, developed key features, implemented an LLM-powered prompt system for PDF date extraction, and resolved major issues. I also led the frontend setup of GenHR, an HRMS tool, building reusable components and scalable modules from scratch.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Contributed significantly to the NFTtrace mobile app's admin dashboard by developing the Support and Offer modules for both frontend and backend. Integrated Firebase into the Sutr project to improve real-time data synchronization and authentication. Successfully resolved critical bugs in the Obortech project, enhancing system stability and performance through detailed debugging and optimization, driving overall project efficiency.

title: Full stack Trainee
description: Developed the frontend for Wild Wheat Bakery's website, enhancing user experience and interface. Contributed to various frontend components of IRCTC Tejas-NfTtrace, including building a feedback module to boost user engagement and data collection, while resolving complex bugs for smooth functionality. Additionally, worked on optimizing ChainCode Consulting's website, improving performance and user interaction.
